name: corgi
title: Corgi
description: Modern system and service monitoring built on node.

scripts.prestart: node node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o baseUrl=public/js mainConfigFile=public/js/main.js name=../vendor/almond/almond include=main out=public/js/main.min.js wrap=true generateSourceMaps=true optimize=uglify2 preserveLicenseComments=false
